This game & the dev's attitude are another example of why competition for products/services is very important.

The game itself is good. The devs however take far, FAR too long fixing things. CORE features in most games such as graphical/accessibility options,  bug fixes and """balance""" changes are either not implemented or take a ridiculous amount of time to be released. Colour-blind options being a prime example (supposedly being worked on now after 4 YEARS (!!!) of the community being vocal about it). 
You still can't even turn off anti-aliasing for fucks sake! Another feature that they assured was being """worked on""" a FUCKING YEAR AGO.

Overall the game is fun, but it really could be so, so much more.
Are u finding a balance game? SKIP this game
me gusta cuando doy pena y me dejan ganar
Очень интересная игра но иногда некоторые игроки играя за маньяка вешают людей и просто стоят и контролируют что-бы этого человека не сняли. Но так игра нормальная всем советую.

I am in a weird relationship with this game. It is unique, it is fun, and it has a good basic gameplay formula, so why am I recommending against getting this game?

It is the Developers. They have proven time and again how disconnected they are from the issues plaguing the game. Between rushed updates that lead to several gamebreaking bugs, very poor optimization on the maps, and the blatant ignorance that they have displayed towards the balance of the game, and the content creators who are willing to criticize them getting banned from any of their forums or streams, more often than not, make the game not fun and makes me not willing to support them. The devs also don't put in effort to understand why something might be a problem, they only look at the statistics, which isn't always accurate. As an example, there is currently a survivor perk (skills you can load on your character to assist in your or your teams survival or objective completion) that lets the survivor see the killer's position, and in a strong Survive with Friends group, that can completely shut down killers and their potential mindgames at loops. The devs only look at the survival rates of the survivor running this perk and say it's balanced because the statistics say the survivor only has a 50% survival rate.

The other major issue I have with the game is the microtransactions. At the time of writing this, if you were to buy only the base game, and nothing else, you have a selection of 3 killers to play, and 4 survivors. If you were to unlock other survivors/killers by buying their DLCs directly from steam, you are looking at spending something around $145, just to unlock the game's full gameplay. This does not include the cosmetics, which cost anywhere from $5 to $15 for a single item. You do have the option of unlocking MOST killers and survivors (licensed killers and survivors like Demogorgon and Michael Myers can't be earned for free) for free by earning a special currency by playing the game. The major issue with this is that to earn enough currency to buy a single killer or survivor, it takes somewhere around 65-70 hours of nonstop playing to earn enough currency.

I really want to recommend this game, and if the Developers pull their heads out of their a**es and actually try to understand what is wrong with the game, rather than just looking at flat statistics, and proceed to fix it instead of trying to pump out as many cosmetics and new DLCs as possible to milk as much money as they can, I would change my recommendation. As it is, I would say to wait or find a different game. I am also writing this after having not played to see if I would come back to it, and ultimately, no, I have no desire to return to this game in it's current state.

Oyuna Beta Sürümündeyken Başladım Gayet Güzel Bir Korku Oyunu. 4 kurban 1de katilimiz var amacımız 5 jeneratörü yapıp kapıyı açıp kaçmak. katil olarakta kurbanların kaçışını engellemek,onları öldürmek. Oyunun tek bir sıkıntısı katil oynamak istiyorsanız yarım saatte 1 saatte lobi buluyor can sıkıcı.Oyunda Toxicler Çok Katil olarakta, kurban olarakta. onun dışında alıpta pişman olmayacağınız arkadaşlarınızla iyi vakit geçirebileğiniz bir korku oyunudur.

I have never played a worse optimized, bugged and glitchy game as this one. There are hotfix patches that introduce more bugs than help. Corefeatures like reconnecting to a game are missing. Servers latency should not be an issue in a game that is present in 2020 but it is an huge issue here, like you get hit even though you are meters away from the killer. Matchmaking never is basically none existing since rank 1 only means that a player played a lot. There is much more than that.

Even though all of the above is true, I am still playing the game and still enjoy it and coming back to it. 
There is something about this game that makes it really good, even though it should not be.

Jeu extrêmement addictif, on y retrouve un véritable côté compétitif du fait par le choix de customisation possible qui est vraiment variable. Chaque tueur est unique et fourni une expérience de jeu unique. Seul bémol : le fait de payer un jeu et d'y retrouvé presque l'intégralité du contenu payant car en effet, certains tueurs et survivant ne sont disponible qu'en échange d'argent réel... De plus, pour ma part, des défis faisable uniquement avec ces tueurs payant me sont proposé, ce qui rend ces défis impossible a réaliser sans mettre d'argent.
This is very fu**ing good strategy game and i love it .

Where do I start with this game?  

Pros: You can hunt people.

Downsides:  Sometimes it sucks to be hunted.

It is kind of like an RPG at times, and there are two roles.

Coordinated teams (3+) will almost ALWAYS be able to 3 or 4 escape you as killer no matter how well you play, how cheap the tactics you resort to, and the amount of mistakes the survivors make in game (within reason) which they will overcome with communication and coordination.
